verbose_text: Reaction mixtures (20 muL) were prepared containing 2 mM MgCl 2, 200 muM each dNTP, 400 nM each forward and reverse primer, 8 muM SYTO (R) 9 (Thermo Fisher Scientific), 0.04 U of GoTaq (R) Flexi DNA Polymerase (Promega, Wisconsin, USA) per mL, Colorless GoTaq (R) Flexi Buffer (Promega, Wisconsin, USA), and 2 muL of DNA template.
